-- CHESS SWORD --
-- Handle to the game service, in case we need to get the time r = game:service("RunService")
-- normal damage, when the sword touches a humanoid object local damage = 5
-- Slash damage local slash_damage = 10
-- Stab damage local stab_damage = 10
-- Handle to tool sword = script.Parent.Handle Tool = script.Parent
-- For the Animations local SlashAnim local StabAnim
-- Sounds! local SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\SwordSlash.wav" SlashSound.Parent = Tool SlashSound.Volume = .7
local SwordStab = Instance.new("Sound") SwordStab.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=45941860" SwordStab.Parent = Tool SwordStab.Volume = 1.0
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = Tool UnsheathSound.Volume = 0.3
-- When a collision is detected between the player and another character function blow(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand
local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end
end end
-- Tagging and Untagging primarily for the leaderboards function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
-- On, left click! function attack() damage = slash_damage if SlashSound then SlashSound:Play() end end
-- On double click! function lunge() damage = stab_damage -- Play the Stab Animation if SwordStab then SwordStab:Play() end -- 3D Rotation matrix, for the sword to spin with the character to perform the double handed stab for i = 1, 5 do -- These are the angles we need to rotate the sword by as the animation plays phi = (i*math.pi/10) theta = i *math.pi/15 * 2 psi = i *math.pi/20 + math.pi Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(math.cos(theta) * math.cos(phi), - math.cos(psi) * math.cos(phi) + math.sin(phi) * math.sin(theta) * math.cos(psi), math.sin(phi) * math.sin(psi) + math.cos(phi) * math.sin(theta) * math.cos(psi)) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(math.sin(psi) * math.cos(theta), math.cos(phi) * math.cos(psi) + math.sin(psi)* math.sin(theta) * math.sin(phi), - math.sin(phi) * math.cos(psi) + math.cos(phi) * math.sin(theta) * math.sin(psi)) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(-math.sin(theta), math.sin(phi) * math.cos(theta), math.cos(theta) * math.cos(phi)) wait(.1) end wait(1) --Reset the sword back to its original Orientation Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1.0, 0.0, 0.0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0.0, 1.0, 0.0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 1.0) -- Reset the damage back to default denying the unholy amounts of parry damage the Mahjong Sword is capable of doing damage = 5 end
-- Tentative lock Tool.Enabled = true local last_attack = 0
function onActivated()
if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
-- Check if the handle to the Player is still available in the space local MyPlayer = Tool.Parent if MyPlayer == nil then return end
-- Check to see if the humanoid is still in the world local MyHumanoid= MyPlayer:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if MyHumanoid == nil then return end -- Time between wait steps t = r.Stepped:wait() -- If, the mouse is clicked continously, perform the stab else perform the slash if (t - last_attack < .2) then -- Stop slash sounds or animations that might have been invoked previously if SlashSound then SlashSound:Stop() end if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Stop() end StabAnim = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Stab) if StabAnim then StabAnim:Play() end lunge() -- Wait for the animation to finish -- Total Animation time in this case is 2.5seconds wait(1.5) else attack()
if SwordStab then SwordStab:Stop() end -- Load and play the animation SlashAnim = MyHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SideSlash) if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Play() end end
last_attack = t Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() -- Play the default unsheath sound if UnsheathSound then UnsheathSound:Play() end if SwordStab then SwordStab:Stop() end if SlashSound then SlashSound:Stop() end end
function onUnequipped() -- Remove the sounds and the animations SwordStab.Volume = 0 SlashSound.Volume = 0 if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Stop() end if StabAnim then StabAnim:Stop() end if SwordStab then SwordStab:Stop() end if SlashSound then SlashSound:Stop() end if UnsheathSound then UnsheathSound:Stop()end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped)
connection = sword.Touched:connect(blow)

local Tool = script.Parent;
local stillEquipped = true function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
